mapper.select: SELECT t.TABLESPACE_NAME, t.STATUS, t.CONTENTS, (SELECT ROUND(SUM(BYTES)/1024/1024, 2) FROM DBA_DATA_FILES WHERE TABLESPACE_NAME = t.TABLESPACE_NAME) AS TOTAL_MB FROM DBA_TABLESPACES t ORDER BY t.TABLESPACE_NAME

SELECT FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, TABLESPACE_NAME, ROUND(BYTES/1024/1024, 2) AS SIZE_MB, AUTOEXTENSIBLE, ROUND(MAXBYTES/1024/1024, 2) AS MAX_SIZE_MB, INCREMENT_BY AS NEXT_SIZE_MB, STATUS FROM DBA_DATA_FILES WHERE TABLESPACE_NAME = #{tablespaceName} ORDER BY FILE_ID

SELECT d.FILE_ID, d.FILE_NAME, d.TABLESPACE_NAME, ROUND(d.BYTES/1024/1024, 2) AS SIZE_MB, d.AUTOEXTENSIBLE, ROUND(d.MAXBYTES/1024/1024, 2) AS MAX_SIZE_MB, ROUND(d.INCREMENT_BY * t.BLOCK_SIZE / 1024 / 1024, 2) AS NEXT_SIZE_MB, d.STATUS FROM DBA_DATA_FILES d LEFT JOIN DBA_TABLESPACES t ON d.TABLESPACE_NAME = t.TABLESPACE_NAME WHERE d.TABLESPACE_NAME = #{tablespaceName} ORDER BY d.FILE_ID
SELECT TO_NUMBER(VALUE) FROM V$PARAMETER WHERE NAME = 'db_block_size'
